name: Simplicity of Catching DVD

Patrick has an instructional style that is both thorough and easy to understand.  Great for the beginner and seasoned athlete!  Learn tips, techniques, and drills to improve your game!  If Simplicity of Catching is not the best catching instructional video on the market, just return your DVD within 60 days and receive a 110% refund guaranteed.
